abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Khalid Alyahya at
            the Board meeting of November 4, 1997 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy Progress Report, the Financial Sector
            Adjustment Credit, and the Southern Governorate Rural
            Development Project for Yemen.
